architectural_notes: Store users in backend with username, hashed password, and role (admin/supervisor).
Enforce role-based access control for dashboard and settings.
known_issues: Some error popups are currently transparent; should be solid white background for popups/dropdowns.

existing_features.title: Reduce the size of the three "Documents by Direction" count boxes on the Dashboard page (Inward/Outward/Important) by approximately 30% while keeping their current content and structure.
Enforce role-based access control so that admin/supervisor roles actually control access to the Settings page and the Dashboard.
Ensure all popups, dialogs, and dropdown menus use a solid (non-transparent) white background in light mode, and a solid non-transparent background in dark mode, across the app.

new_feature_requests.summary: Reduce the 'Documents by Direction' dashboard count boxes size by 30%
Add backend user management with username + hashed password + role (admin, supervisor)
Implement role-based access control to restrict/enforce access to the dashboard and settings based on admin/supervisor roles
Update all popups and dropdowns to use a solid white (non-transparent) background
Implement backend-stored user accounts that include username, hashed password, and role (admin or supervisor), and provide admin-only APIs to create, update (role/password), list, and delete users.
